Name: Affogato Cocktail
Ingredients: 15 ml De Kuyper Crème de Cafe
15 ml De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
BLEND all ingredients with three cubes of ice.
Garnish with 3 coffee beans floated in a petal formation in the centre of the cocktail's foamy head.
Review: Based on the eponymous classic Italian dessert, this after-dinner cocktail blends coffee and chocolate with ice-cream, appropriately fortified with a splash of grappa.
History: Created in 2013 by yours truly for Jamie Oliver's Jamie's Italian bars.
